Package casino.game

Interface IGame

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGame, DefaultGame
public interface IGame
represents a game in a casino. every game needs access to the gaming authority API for logging and for betting round activities and needs to have a gamerule.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean acceptBet​(Bet bet, IGamingMachine gamingMachine)
    Accept a bet on the current betting round.
    void determineWinner()
    End the current bettinground and calculate the winner using the gamerules.
    java.util.Set<BettingRound> getBettingRounds()
    all the betting rounds added to the game will be returned
    java.util.Set<GamingMachine> getConnectedMachines()
    all the gaming machines connected to the game will be returned
    BettingRound getCurrentBettingRound()
    to get the betting round created for the game
    boolean isBettingRoundFinished()
    determine if the right number of bets are done (determined by gamerules) to be able to calculate a winner.
    void setCurrentBettingRound​(BettingRound currentBettingRound)
    to set the current betting round with another betting round this is mainly created for testing to mock the calls to the bettingRound
    void startBettingRound()
    create and start a new BettingRound.

  • Method Details

    • startBettingRound

      void startBettingRound()
      create and start a new BettingRound. when called when a current bettinground is active: the current bettinground ends and a new bettinground is created, which becomes the current bettinground. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API

    • acceptBet

      boolean acceptBet​(Bet bet, IGamingMachine gamingMachine) throws NoCurrentRoundException, NoBetsMadeException, InvalidAmountException
      Accept a bet on the current betting round. determine if the betting round is finished, if so: determine the winner, notify the connected gaming machines and start a new betting round. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Parameters:
      bet - the bet to be made on the betting round
      gamingMachine - gamingmachine which places bet on this game.
      Returns:
      true when bet is accepted by the game, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      NoCurrentRoundException - when no BettingRound is currently active.
      NoBetsMadeException
      InvalidAmountException

    • determineWinner

      void determineWinner() throws NoBetsMadeException, InvalidAmountException
      End the current bettinground and calculate the winner using the gamerules. notifiy all connected game machines of the BetResult. When no bets have been made yet, no winner can be determined. In this case, only log to the betlogging authority, and end the current bettinground. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Throws:
      NoBetsMadeException
      InvalidAmountException

    • isBettingRoundFinished

      boolean isBettingRoundFinished() throws NoCurrentRoundException
      determine if the right number of bets are done (determined by gamerules) to be able to calculate a winner. for calculation a winner, a true random value needs to be received from the gambling authority API. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Returns:
      true if all necessary bets are made in the betting round, otherwise false
      Throws:
      NoCurrentRoundException

    • getCurrentBettingRound

      BettingRound getCurrentBettingRound()
      to get the betting round created for the game
      Returns:
      the current betting round

    • setCurrentBettingRound

      void setCurrentBettingRound​(BettingRound currentBettingRound)
      to set the current betting round with another betting round this is mainly created for testing to mock the calls to the bettingRound
      Parameters:
      currentBettingRound -

    • getConnectedMachines

      java.util.Set<GamingMachine> getConnectedMachines()
      all the gaming machines connected to the game will be returned
      Returns:
      set of gaming machines added to the game

    • getBettingRounds

      java.util.Set<BettingRound> getBettingRounds()
      all the betting rounds added to the game will be returned
      Returns:
      set of betting rounds added to the game
